thread.title: Bleacher Creatures To Make Texas-Sized Debut At Dallas Toy Fair at Booth #13-3508
thread.title_full: Bleacher Creatures To Make Texas-Sized Debut At Dallas Toy Fair at Booth #13-3508 - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Bleacher Creatures To Make Texas-Sized Debut At Dallas Toy Fair at Booth #13-3508
text:
Innovative Creator of Incredibly True-to-Life Plush Figures of Cultural Icons to Premiere New Lines of Sports and Entertainment Plush
Plymouth Meeting, PA (PRWEB) October 02, 2015
Bleacher Creatures, the innovative licensing manufacturer renowned for its incredibly true-to-life plush figures of sports and entertainment icons, will make its Dallas Toy Fair debut October 6–8 at Booth #13-3508. The company will present its most popular current lines of plush—including stars of the MLB, NFL, NBA, NHL, MLS and NASCAR and characters from Marvel’s Avengers and Ant-Man, DC Universe and DC TV—and will offer previews of upcoming lines, such as characters from the films Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice, starring Ben Affleck and Henry Cavill, and Captain America: Civil War, starring Chris Evans and Robert Downey, Jr.
“We’re thrilled to be bringing our plush figures to Dallas Toy Fair, where we’ll present the biggest collection in our company’s history,” said Matthew Hoffman, President and founder of Bleacher Creatures. “There’s nothing more exciting than seeing our greatest icons in 10-inch-tall plush size, and we anticipate a fantastic reaction from the attendees at Toy Fair.”
The Bleacher Creatures plush figures that will be on display at Dallas Toy Fair include a diverse blend of the company’s most popular sellers, as well as hotly anticipated new properties.
Bleacher Creatures sports properties to be displayed at Dallas Toy Fair:
NFL NBA MLB NHL MLS NASCAR
Bleacher Creatures sports properties to debut at Dallas Toy Fair:
2015 NBA season plush figures + legends New players include:
-Klay Thompson (Golden State Warriors), Andrew Wiggins (Minnesota Timberwolves), Kawhi Leonard (San Antonio Spurs), Jimmy Butler (Chicago Bulls), Kevin Love (Cleveland Cavaliers), Marc Gasol (Memphis Grizzlies), Kemba Walker (Charlotte Hornets), Victor Oladipo (Orlando Magic), LeBron James and Kyrie Irving (Cleveland Cavaliers, in their navy jerseys), Jeff Teague, Kyle Korver, and Dennis Schröder (Atlanta Hawks), John Wall (Washington Wizards; in their navy jerseys), and Steph Curry (Golden State Warriors, in three new jerseys: slate, gold, and blue).
New Hardwood Legends include: -Allen Iverson (Philadelphia 76ers), Dennis Rodman (Chicago Bulls), Shaquille O’Neal (Orlando Magic), Penny Hardaway (Orlando Magic), Scottie Pippen (Chicago Bulls), Tyrone “Muggsy” Bogues (Charlotte Hornets)
2015 NHL season plush figures + legends: -Connor McDavid (Edmonton Oilers), Jack Eichel (Buffalo Sabres), Jonathan Tavares (New York Islanders), Jakub Voráek (Philadelphia Flyers), Rick Nash (New York Rangers), P.K. Subban, Carey Price, and Max Pacioretty (Montreal Canadiens), Zach Parise (Minnesota Wild), Evander Kane (Buffalo Sabres), Henrik Zetterberg (Detroit Red Wings), Alex Ovechkin (Washington Capitals, in his home jersey), Vladimir Tarasenko and David Backes (St. Louis Blues), Johnny Gaudreau (Calgary Flames), and Erik Karlsson (Ottawa Senators).
European Soccer Clubs: FC Barcelona: -Andres Iniesta, Gerard Pique, Lionel Messi, Neymar Jr.
Chelsea FC: -Diego Costa, Eden Hazard, Jose Mourinho, John Terry
Manchester City FC: -David Silva, Raheem Sterling, Sergio Aguero
Liverpool FC: -Adam Lallana, Jordan Henderson, Philippe Coutinho, Roberto Firmino
WWE: -The Rock, John Cena, Brock Lesnar, Roman Reigns
Bleacher Creatures entertainment properties to be displayed Dallas Toy Fair:
Marvel’s Avengers Marvel’s Ant-Man Marvel’s Hulkbuster (Avengers) Batman ‘66 DC Universe DC TV: The Flash, Arrow, Penguin The Godfather, Rocky Balboa, Archer, The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies Marvel Universe Series 1:
-Guardians Of The Galaxy: Smiling Groot, Rocket Raccoon, Star-Lord
-Spiderman, Venom, Punisher
Bleacher Creatures entertainment properties to debut at Dallas Toy Fair:
Marvel’s Deadpool Warcraft:
-Durotan (Orc), Anduin Lothar (Human)
Marvel Comics: -Spider-Man (Miles Morales), Spider Gwen, Ms. Marvel, She-Hulk, Female Thor, Deadpool (X-Force)
Captain America: Civil War: -Falcon, Captain America, Black Widow, War Machine, Black Panther, Winter Soldier
Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice: -Superman, Batman, Wonder Woman, Aquaman, Armor Batman
DC TV: -Reverse Flash (from “The Flash”), The Atom (from “Arrow”), Supergirl (from “Supergirl”)
Rocky: -40th Anniversary Rocky in Gold Robe, Apollo Creed
###
About Bleacher Creatures
Bleacher Creatures is an innovative licensing manufacturer that produces a variety of children’s toys and fan enthusiast products through partnerships with professional sports leagues and entertainment companies. Bleacher Creatures are incredibly true-to-life plush figures of the greatest athletes and entertainment icons, allowing young fans (those who are young at heart) to put their passion in play. Bleacher Creatures' goal: to encourage fun, inspiration and, of course, play among fans of any age.
